title: "Dashboards with Quarto"
server: shiny
format: 
  dashboard:
    theme: 
      - flatly
---

```{r}
#| context: setup
library(ggplot2)
library(palmerpenguins)
data(penguins)
library(shiny)
library(bslib)
shinyOptions(bslib=TRUE)
```

# {.sidebar}

```{r}
bs_theme_new()

choices <- c("species", "island")   
selectInput("variable", "Select Variable to color by", choices)
```

# Plot

```{r}
plotOutput("my_plot")
```

# Data

```{r}
knitr::kable(penguins)
```

```{r}
#| context: server

output$my_plot <- renderPlot({
  req(input$variable)
  
  ggplot(penguins) +
    aes(x=bill_length_mm, 
        y=bill_depth_mm, 
        color= .data[[input$variable]] ) +
      geom_point()
})
```
